head.Intro: Currently living in KL, Malaysia. A lifelong learner with passion in programming.

aboutMe.Intro: An electronic engineering graduate with over one year of experience in semiconductor field. Looking to take advantage of knowledge in programming to enhance and apply my skills in front end development. Passionate about technology and always be willing to learn and contribute as a team player.

Career.Title: Design Verification Engineer
Description: develop comprehensive test plans, design direct and random test cases to verify the correctness of the hardware design
work and communicate with different departments to perform verification and validation of system functions
create reusable test codes to improve productivity and efficiency

Career.Title: Internship
Description: prepare schematic diagram and documentation for quality check

mainProjects.Title: Shopping
mainProjects.Overview: Products are fetched from Fakestore API and categorized into 4 categories. With filter system applied, highlighted products will be shown on main page. Cart will be updated synchronously for checkout purposes. Stripe API is used as payment platform with Nodejs as server side

mainProjects.Title: Look for Movies
mainProjects.Overview: A Vanilla javascript project for users to search for movies. All data are fetched from The Movie Database (TMDB). An overview will be shown for each movie on main page and more details are provided by clicking movie's title.
